name: Dribble Hero
description:
Kickoff infinite goal scoring fun in this simple-to-play soccer game.

Dribble and avoid endless tackles of every team. Reach within shooting range to strike. Score and celebrate wins.

Shoot most goals against different teams from all over the world. Unlock and play for your favorite team. Beat the goal scoring records to top the Global Leaderboard.


Features:
• Unlock famous teams and their top players by achieving goals and high scores.
• Play unlimited against all teams, on their home turf, in all weather conditions.
• Unique Slow motion feature to help you find gaps in the defense.
• Arcade-style visuals, retro music and super-cool sound effects.
